page.title: 08FARMING ON CARNEVAS FARM
page.content:
{Peter Brewer}rents{Carnevas}<163 acres> and owns{Trevorrick}<133 acres>.Peter has 163 acres of grassland including 20 acres of cut silage,3 acres of round-bail silage, 30 acres of rape,13 acres of rough grassing,50 acres of winter barley, 40 acres of spring barley,22 acres of dredge corn{<mixed cereal>,}and 8 acres of wheat.Peter is in the{C.L.A Country Land Association which helps him manage land properly.He goes to{ {Wadebridge,St.Columb,and Truro markets weekly, he rarely goes to{Liskard} market.Peter has a sheep dog called{ {Trigger,}and 5 wild farm cats. There is 1 employee called Keith Bray but Peter is helped by his sons Roger 20 and Jeffery 11.
{ }
